website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive set of 4 best used for tracking items around the house.
pros: Includes key rings for attaching to keys and an LED flashlight on the remote
cons: Batteries die fast in remote and fobs

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised, but a piece of junk ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised, but a piece of junk. Cheaply made everything. Works and usefull if the keys live on top of a counter or maybe a confy purse. One broke apart after one day in my pocket. Second battery lid broke off in my pocket starting the day and wont lock back on. Gave up already.
customer_reviews.author: Toastyparty

customer_reviews.title: Had mine less then a week and the batteries were going bad.
customer_reviews.text: Order new batteries when you order this item. Batteries come with it but their very cheap and don't last very long. Had mine less then a week and the batteries were going bad. Review continued today date 6-2-17. Beware of buying this item. I have replaced all new batteries in mine and two of them just continue to beep and make static noise. I have only had this product for less then a month and Amazon or nobody will allow a return or refund. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick j.

customer_reviews.title: Had issues with the first one, but customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: The green started softly beeping by itself in the second day and the blue one beeped as I drove the car. The back covers for the green and red one came off. And the purple one wouldn't beep anymore when I pressed the remote. The remote light still worked though, but I didn't need an $18 mini flashlight. Anyway, I couldn't return it in time so I'm out of luck. Not recommended Update: I decided to contact the manufacturer and they sent me another set. This time they worked better. I think maybe improve the quality control
customer_reviews.author: Claire D

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have not needed to use the Item Locator/Key Finder yet to locate a missing item. However, we did have a problem with two of the attachments frequently going off in my wife's purse, with no pressing of the corresponding colors on the transmitter. In fact, the batteries were removed from the transmitter at the time. I simply called JTD's customer service number and was sent replacements for the two problem attachments, in the proper colors. Immediately and since then, there have been no problems. That's what I call great customer service. The only thing that I would have liked is smaller size attachments - say slightly larger than their battery.
customer_reviews.author: Lou. S

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but needs better battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an old guy who is forever forgetting where I put stuff like car keys, my wallet, remote controls, etc. This locater does the job. I haven't lost an item connected with one of the locator's remotes since I bought it. My biggest criticism is battery life seems to be less than is acceptable. I have a spare set of car keys I attached a remote to and I find the device will not beep after about two months until I replace the battery. With four remotes you can go through an awful lot of batteries and if you don't replace the batteries regularly, you won't find the device (keys, remote etc.) that you bought the locator to locate.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Grandma is happy
customer_reviews.text: My grandma had spent a lot of money loosing all her keys very often due memory fail by age having to hired a locksmith service too. The problem was solved with these locators. Now she only has to keep the remote in her purse... For $18.00 is more than ok. I noticed that the battery covers are very easy to loose by dropping by accident the keys to the floor, so I put some adhesive tape on each. Problem solved. The plastic feels cheap but is ok. I don’t mind buying these locators a couple of time a year...is cheaper than the original problem and her peace of mind is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good time and in perfect condition. It is an excellent little helper for the chronic key misplaced. The fobs are easy to attach to any key ring or any other item you tend to "misplace". The different color fobs make it a breeze to find your individual item, by pressing the corresponding color on the base unit. The sound emitted makes it easy to track down the missing item. My only complaint is the fobs are not as sturdy as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Coverkid

customer_reviews.title: The beeping when the battery is low is as annoying as a smoke detector.
customer_reviews.text: So I was using this device to help my boyfriend keep a track of his keys and our TV remotes. They worked right away. But the bad thing is that about a month or two after putting the batteries in these things wouldn't stop beeping! It was driving me crazy. Because there were on all of our TV remotes both in the living room and in the bedroom. And on key chains. The beeping was coming everywhere and I couldn't figure it out. I thought it was the damn smoke detectors. I highly don't recommend these because the beeping after 2 months will drive you crazy. And it only happened when it was in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Aritha D.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Trash
customer_reviews.text: Utter CRAP. PLEASE let me know if you find a quality key finder. I'm the WORST or BEST when it comes to losing keys. Unfortunately I do it ALL THE TIME, and really need something to help me find them. This work great the first few days, then dies out. No matter how many times I change the batteries, it dies quickly. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Electronic ShinobiTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Update This works great! Before my first one broke I thought the product was just so so because you had to be right on top of the item for it to buzz So that was the start of the lose connection inside til it broke NOW that I have another one I have to say I am super pleased I can be several rooms away and it buzzes And I don’t have to keep pushing the color button , It stays on while I search the house I use this thing Everyday!
customer_reviews.author: lizzie

customer_reviews.title: This has already proven itself!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as one of his Fathers Day gifts since he has a lot of autos and is always losing his keys. Literally the day after he attached this to his keys he lost them. I was being a smartbutt saying if he had used his present he would have found them and low and behold there he was with the base! It emitted a beeping sound that we could hear from outside the garage, he had laid them down inside while waxing one of his cars!!!! Major win, these are now on all of our keychains!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CaroljPatterson

customer_reviews.title: Horrid
customer_reviews.text: Maybe all of the key locators I recieved were from a defective batch, but I doubt it. I used two at a time; one was in my purse and one on my keys. They worked well for a few days, but then I started hearing random beeps. The alarms were going off for no reason at all. My guess is the battery kept losing its connection and everytime it got lower again, it would beep. All of them do it. The only reason I would suggest this purchase is if buying this for the batteries is cheaper than buying the batteries outright. Unfortunately for me, this product was just junk and I cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: B M C

customer_reviews.title: Update: Work very well now.  Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: total crap. Stopped working completely after less than two months. This is an update - the customer service is incredible and were very accommodating. They contacted me after I posted a negative review and sent me a new shipment, which work very well. I must have gotten a dud, which can happen with any product. With the first shipment even when I put a new battery in the red piece I had been using it kept going off and then died. This set works very well. Now if you can just make something like this to attach to glasses... hint hint!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Threw mine away!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this to anyone who does not have a mountain of replacement batteries and a ton of patience. The batteries that shipped with it started beeping within a week and brand new Duracell batteries only lasted a month before all 4 units started chirping in the middle of the night. (Worse than smoke alarms). I really wish I could give this a positive review because it's a good concept, just really bad design, materials or manufacturing. Someone should have done some quality control testing on these before selling on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Better than bluetooth, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this & I suppose you can't expect super high quality for $18. It would be fine if it didn't randomly beep for no reason. I was in the dentist's office today & my pocket was beeping. This has begun happening (the random beeping) with 2 out of the 4 receivers that came with the package. I would have preferred to have 2 receivers that were made a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great but simple device to save a lot of frustration. We put one of the 4 locator pendents on 2 canes, one cell phone and one TV remote. Saved a lot of time on the first day finding where a Cane was "lost" and where that darn TV Remote was hiding. Highly recommend this Locator/Key Finder. Simple to install, simple to use and does not require a high tech device.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Helpful merchant, lousy product
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made; I had TWO major problems with these 1. Battery doors would NOT stay on - lost one within a week, so the helpful merchant sent more promptly. That didn't exactly solve the problem - I have had to TAPE the thing shut, which is no help when: 2. Batteries last a couple of weeks before the device begins to emit a very unpleasant squealing sound and stops working until the battery is changed. I must have gone through 20 overpriced coin sized batteries since I bought these. The range on the device is okay (within our house), but the fobs are pretty bulky...I'm trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: What works, works well. But not all remotes work.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Not sure how long these had been stored but one of the batteries only lasted 30 days without ANY use. The purple beeper stopped working entirely even with battery swaps. It beeps when the battery is installed but it will not keep when the locater remote is pressed. I would only give this 3 stars. 25% of the product already not working in less than a month with literally ZERO use.
customer_reviews.author: Vanguard

customer_reviews.title: The product worked out of the box. However, ...
customer_reviews.text: The product worked out of the box. However, a few months later it did not work. Basically the single time I actually needed the product it failed.
customer_reviews.author: Pigsfeet

customer_reviews.title: Works until it decides to beep for no reason at all.
customer_reviews.text: Well, we loved it until the beepers started beeping for no reason at all. Just because you looked at the key fob. We did what everyone would do - change the batteries. "perhaps the battery is going dead?" Worked for 2 days and then beeps randomly again. Although it's a great idea and considerably less expensive than TILE, it simply doesn't work properly. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: EvanS.

customer_reviews.title: this was great product, works great, but only 3 month and remote completely stop working.
customer_reviews.text: update review: 1) I gave 5 stars right after I purchase first unit, 2) then update to 1 star because my remote stopped work,. but back to 5 stars because 1)product performed perfectly until I had the problem, 2) seller response almost immediately for all my emails to them. 3)and they will send another unit immediately too. 4) I purchased 3 more unit for gifts, all of my friend an their family love this "JTD Wireless RF Item Locator/Key Finder with remote"..
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Pieces fall off & get lost
customer_reviews.text: My son gave this to me as a gift because I always had to search for keys. I have several vehicles, tool boxes, lawn maintenance items. Sounds like a really cool gift. Almost as soon as I had keys categorized and batteries installed, the little tops for holding the batteries in place became a nuisance as they would fall off in the yard, house, or dark car and were very difficult to find. I ordered a second set to replace lost pieces. I used scotch tape to hold pieces in place but it was really just a poorly made product. Do not buy one and certainly not a second one.
customer_reviews.author: SYLVIA

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas present. Avoid the blame
customer_reviews.text: WIsh the key fobs were a little smaller but they work well. Should have invested in these years ago. Several times a year, one of us loses a set of keys and my wife always blames me. She usually finds them in a coat pocket or purse but still insists losing them was somehow my fault.
customer_reviews.author: J JACQUES

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The stickers they include don't stick worth a darn, so you can't put one on your phone. In addition, the cover they put to enclose the battery on the tags falls open. I could clearly see that was going to be a problem as soon as I opened the box. Then the battery falls out and it's useless. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: crowebird1

customer_reviews.title: Item finder insurance
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and attached a remote unit when I got frustrated trying to find some keys that I had dropped behind some shelving in the house and spent the better part of a weekend looking for them. The instructions for this unit were clear and easy to follow and implement, and I've tested the range which depending on whether you're indoors or not and between floors can be several rooms and floors. Of course, since I installed the tracking fob on my keys I haven't misplaced them so I've not had to use the remote finder. I suppose if I don't misplace them again the product has already paid for itself! I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Big Blue Fan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: All transponders broke stopped working after about 6 m9nths. Battery was not the issue
customer_reviews.author: mohammed m jebril

customer_reviews.title: No more lost keys
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is notorious for loosing his keys. Most mornings he would be running late for work and we would be destroying the house trying to find them! This product is GREAT! You press the button on the remote and it beeps so you can go on a scavenger hunt to find your keys, definitely puts you in the general area of the sound and we haven't had late mornings searching for missing keys since we got it!! Wonder if these would work on the dog collars!!😉
customer_reviews.author: JSchu

customer_reviews.title: Good units
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderfully. Although one of the four units shorts out and beeps all the time (the metal base plate is loose), the other three work fine. I used these receivers one two key chains to help locate missing keys. The transmitter is color coded to the color of the receiver. One design suggestion, provide a tad more twist for securing the back of the receiver...ours have a tendency to come loose when the keys are in a pocket. Otherwise, these are nice units. Also, better quality control would have prevented the obviously loose base in one receiver from being sent out. I still recommend using this unit. For the price, it is still a good deal
customer_reviews.author: elgreco

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This system worked for five whole months before quitting. I used it a few times and it worked fine. Now it is trash. Disappointed. I am writing to change my review of this company and its customer care. They were very responsive to my complaints even willing to replace the item. I had tried new batteries for the fobs. I went to the store and bought more batteries and sure enough they worked. Apparently the batteries that I had on hand for this occasion were DOA. Glad I persisted and bought new batteries. That said it seems like a short life for the batteries but worth it when you can't find your keys, phone etc.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritualOne

customer_reviews.title: Poor engineering
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box only 3/4 receivers worked. We were shipped a replacement. A couple weeks in and two of the four receivers wake-up and beep at random. The other two are attached to FOBs that have just sat in a drawer and aren't used. I would guess that they will fail in the same way when we switch to them. I think I used the key finder three times and it is ready now for the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: ScottF

customer_reviews.title: No more search party for hubby's keys
customer_reviews.text: My husband loses his keys on a daily basis (sometimes more than once a day). This thing is great! He has several sets for different cars or whatever so he got one beeper thing for each one. Now when he loses his keys, he can just press the button instead of making everyone in the house go on a search party for his stuff. Seriously, my only complaint is that I should have bought this sooner! It was a good price and even came with all the batteries. Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Key Finder does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and inexpensive. Fairly intuitive, though you do have to remember the color to press when you can't find your object... Only issue I had is that some of the lids (over the round batteries) may not click into place. If not positively set in place, they can pop open at the least bump, with the parts flying of in different directions.
customer_reviews.author: BlueGull

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised !
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great discovery for someone whose keys can teleport themselves into mysterious places. First big plus was the completeness of the parts included. There were all batteries needed, plus an extra set of 2032 batteries for replacement down the line. Installation instructions were clear and step-by-step. Best of all, the product works as advertised for locating keys, etc. We will see how well it holds up over the long run but for now am completely satisfied. Only improvement I could suggest might be a bracket to hang it next to my dozen or so wall-mounted remote controls.
customer_reviews.author: sharon mast

customer_reviews.title: Made a good Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 3 stars because it seems a little quiet. I think if my keys were under some clothes, in a closet, that I might not be able to hear it. This is also a problem in a large house. Maybe not a problem in a smaller house or apartment. Perhaps they did this so that the batteries would last longer. Dont' forget to check batteries occasionally! Made a good Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: For some reason one of the fobs just wouldnt work, even when we tried different batteries. It would beep when the battery was starting to go in, but once it was secure nothing happened. Don't have time to deal with contacting anyone to fix it, but the other fobs work fine for the price. Edit: The company mailed us another fob to replace the broken one. It works well for the price. My mom seems to like them so that's a plus :)
customer_reviews.author: SingsweetKT

customer_reviews.title: Complete Nuissance
customer_reviews.text: Thought it’d be a great idea to get this because my boyfriend and I misplace our keys sometimes. I don’t normally regret a purchase but this one...yikes. Beeps randomly no matter how many times we try to fix the battery/lid. Now that I’ve experienced it beeping THROUGHOUT the night, I am officially done. There is no point of these useless locators if the battery can’t even stay in without it beeping out of nowhere. Embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie F.

customer_reviews.title: The constant beeping was annoying
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, as long as you don’t lose the remote. .. the things I don’t like about these is that the alarm chirps all the time, I’m guessing they are chirping because the battery is about dead. But I replaced the battery and they still beep. Maybe the batteries they sent are old? They sent about 5 extra batteries, maybe they are aware that the batteries are crap, I didn’t try my own batteries. I think I’m just going to buy the tiles....also one of the four stopped working
customer_reviews.author: L. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Edit/update: I have only had it for nine months and it doesn't work anymore. I expected it to last at least two years. This is just unacceptable. I have attached one to my roku remote, one to my keys. I have not lost my keys in a while, but the kids love to take the roku remote and hide it so I have used it several times. Sanity saver! I just wish they were thin enough to attach to the other remotes and my cell phone case without impeding their use. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dorthy Gale

customer_reviews.title: This came in the mail yesterday and I really like it. I've been losing my keys a LOT ...
customer_reviews.text: This came in the mail yesterday and I really like it. I've been losing my keys a LOT this year so this is exactly what I needed. We have it attached to the three things we always lose. I plan on attaching the last one to the remote control for my television with the double side sticky foam that came with the product. The key chains are a little bigger than I expected, but they don't get in the way. The volume is loud enough for us to hear through our house. The key chains come with their own batteries but you'll need 2 AAA batteries to get the remote to work.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Papp

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product backed by excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product backed by excellent customer service. Although the beeps are a little on the quiet side, as other reviewers have said, I have never failed to locate an item easily. It even works on my pets as they move throughout the house and yard. I did have need to contact their customer service and they could not have been more helpful. They quickly resolved my issue to my complete satisfaction. I have been looking for a product like this for quite a while and have tried several others. But none worked as well as this one. I am very happy with this product and the customer service. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TKelly

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The seller graciously sent me another finder at no cost to me. This one works flawlessly. I have found it to be very useful and I am more than pleased. It is gratifying to see that there still are people who stand behind their products with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: GFMcD

customer_reviews.title: A great product that has made for smooth mornings! No more running around with my head chopped off!
customer_reviews.text: What I will say about this product is that it is a stress killer! I am a single mom with a 6 year old and I have always been a chronic misplacer, but with kid in tow, it is even worse! Now, my wallet, 2 sets of car keys and my phone are but a beep away. As someone who has tried countless organizational ideas and tips and key holders and the like, this just makes me breathe a sigh of relief. It works great, I have a smaller two bedroom apartment and the range is perfect for finding my must-haves, especially in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: K Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents who have dementia and are always losing their car/house keys. Whenever they call me for help, I now direct them to the Key finder and simply tell them which color button to push to find their keys. They "beeping" it makes is pretty loud. Once we even used it to track down keys that my dad had hidden deep in a sock drawer. Without the key finder, they would probably still be missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some of the keychains work fine, but some of them emits a sound pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets. Some of the keychains work fine, but some of them emits a sound pretty much all day long. I discovered that the batteries don't have a right fit and when they are loose the keychain starts making the noice, non-stop, until you remove the battery. I tried tightening the battery by putting a little piece of cardboard in between the battery and the closing lid, but it only works temporarily. It is very annoying. Otherwise, the ones that work are ok.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: My keys chirp to let me know they miss me.
customer_reviews.text: I lose my keys CONSTANTLY. I've literally misplaced my keys in between the kitchen and the bathroom, a distance of feet! Constantly running around at the last minute trying not to be late to work and getting upset. I still misplace my keys, but now I click a button and my keys chirp to let me know they miss me too. This little device is hardly noticeable and has made my life a whole lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: cfmotta

customer_reviews.title: I have to give them credit...
customer_reviews.text: I have to give them credit for great customer service. They emailed me soon after I posted my review and sent me another kit. So far so good, it saved my wife once when she was late and couldn't find her keys. (Origional) Even after changing out the batteries, all of the key chain units are dead. It's been more frustrating trying to get them to work than finding the keys.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: Green does not mean go
customer_reviews.text: Green remote key did not work. Changed batteries and tried to re-insert thrice with no luck. I bought this item in 2017 (first time) and it was flawless, However, they must have moved product to South China because after two tries it is still junk. They beep for no reason or cover falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Key finder
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 2 of them and they work good for a couple of days, and then they start chirping like there suppose to do when you're looking for them with the remote. I can be anywhere and they will just start chirping. I just wish I could send them back, but I thur the papers away that came with them. So I'm out of the money I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Crewleader

customer_reviews.title: Batteries won't stay in, too quiet, quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Battery covers kept opening, and batteries kept falling out. Actually had to put a tiny drop of hot glue on the back of all the battery covers. Batteries die quickly, beeping is to quiet. Had to turn everything that makes noise in the house off to hear where beeping is coming from- including room air purifiers. It's a pain to keep turning those off and on. Purchased this item June of 2017. It's now March of 2018, and it no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but batteries die before it can be used.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great idea and it seemed to be just what I need when my toddler hides my keys. But I have tried to use it 3 times in the last 6 months since I purchased it and the batteries have been dead every time. I replaced them twice with the batteries that came with the item and purchased new batteries the third time and it was still dead within a week. It kind of defeats the purpose of this item if the battery dies after 2 weeks and it doesn't help find what I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can find my cane!
customer_reviews.text: I use a cane when I am out and about but at home I tend to "furniture surf" so sometimes when I need my cane I can't remember where I left it. (I have ADHD as well) and now with my "where the heck is my cane" button I can find it in a jiffy. I also put one on my keys but so far have kept to my habit of hanging them on the key hook but should I forget, I have my key locator as well
customer_reviews.author: M. Corey

customer_reviews.title: Few days after installing the battery fobs start beeping arbitrarily for no reason.
customer_reviews.text: After few days of carrying it with my keys, the red fob started beeping by itself arbitrarily I replaced it with a green fob, assuming that there could be a problem with battery compartment. This second fob didn't show any problem for about a week, and then also started beeping for no reason. It looks like after inserting a battery some sort of conducting substance accumulates in the battery compartment, and closes the electric circuit. Returning this device to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor cheap implementation
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good, but it's just reeks of cheap cheap plastic Lasts about 1-2 months before the key chain starts beeping on its own, turns out that is low battery warning. Changing the battery and you're good to go again. The keychain units are too big, they open up too easily if you drop your keys, but they did do their job a couple of times where I misplaced my keys. But will be looking for the original, the one that this is a copy of, because it just isn't good enough
customer_reviews.author: Danny Poulsen

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this no stars. The first few days were great. I loved being able to find my keys with the press of a button. My kids are always using my keys and not putting them back. However after a week they would randomly just beep for no reason. I changed the battery and that made no difference. All four of them did the same thing. Worst waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it some much that I bought one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple and reasonably priced product that Works! I use it mainly to find my car keys that I routinely misplace. I enjoyed it some much that I bought one for my niece who uses for car keys and the household remote. We also discovered that she can use my receiver to locate her keys when she visits my house and vice versa. I highly recommend it for location of keys, remotes, tablets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for in house 10 feet to 15 feet warm
customer_reviews.text: This is nice at a close range as of.. 10 feet... But I put one of these on my dog. lol... on his collar. And he was not more then 10 feet outside in cold. So I’m not sure if cold makes it not work as well had to push button a lot. But finally worked when he got 5 feet away. It nice for in house but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Effective problem-solver
customer_reviews.text: If you know anyone who's a little absent-minded, get this for them! I gave it to my aunt and she loves it. She uses this on her phone, keys, purse, and wallet. It saves her SO much time and frustration looking for them. The only thing I would change would be to make the fobs a little less bulky (doesn't work well with a cell phone) and add a place to label the buttons on the remote. Otherwise this is a great product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M.

customer_reviews.title: Drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy about this for a couple reasons: 1) the fobs are a bit bulky and not easy to attach to something like a TV remote or a wallet. 2) the chirper emits the sound through a little hole on the back side. If that side is faced down the chirp volume is reduced dramatically. If the thing has slipped down behind a pillow or cushion, forget it, its near impossible to hear. I suspect it would be hard to hear in most closed purses. But then again, what do you expect for $20.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Private Way to Keep Track of Your Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple system that uses RF to keep track of keys and other objects. I only tried 2 of the keyfobs because that's all I'm using but both worked. The advantage here is that this does not track your whereabouts like an app and bluetooth arrangement to do the same job. It's also cheaper, a big bonus. So far, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestlady

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud, good distance range & so easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love these trackers. My husband is always losing his keys and wallet in the house and this makes it so easy to find. The sound is loud and clear and the range is fantastic; it reached the entire length of our house. I will be buying this as a gift for family members because it is so useful and easy to use. I also love that it is battery operated, unlike some others that require throwing away and a repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: M Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because everyone loses their keys. The only problem is that the finder attached to the keys beeps a lot. I thought maybe the batter was old, but they still randomly beeped for no apparent reason. Love the idea, but maybe the technology needs to be be updated. Sadly, everyone but me has removed them from their key chains. Maybe I just got a defective set.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Schexnayder

customer_reviews.title: There's something strange with the frequencies on the trackers.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good product. The only problem we experienced was when the tracker placed on our dog's collar interfered with the frequency of the tracker on our keys. This caused a "zap" to be transmitted to our dog and caused unusual behavior in him. He was very submissive and uncomfortable until we figured this out and removed the tracker from his collar. It still took him a couple of days to recover from this, as the "zapping" was going on for a long time that day. We separated the trackers and everything seems fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kinner

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully now my review is being edited. I tried to edit it in the iPhone Amazon app last night, and apparently it did not change anything. I had hell with the product, and they exchanged them. They would not stop beeping, and it drove me absolutely mad. The new ones are not beeping uncontrollably, but if they do start beeping uncontrollably, I am going back to a 1-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Collin S.

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed to Fail
customer_reviews.text: Had the previous version of this and the newest one. These work for any amount of time, from 1 week to 6 months, but they will stop working randomly and it's probably not worth your time or money. I've owned 3 and all 3 stopped functioning. These are unfortunately poorly made and clearly it's not easy to make a product like this for this amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The button batteries that came with it were either very weak or old. I couldn't get more than a couple of uses out of them before they stopped working. Even after I replaced the batteries...which is a pain in the ass to change because they keep falling out before you have a chance to put the cover back on...I still didn't get a long use out of them. And the battery cover keeps falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelin51

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: The battery cover has very thin tabs for securing the battery in place. If you drop your keys their is a high likelihood that a tab will break causing the cover and battery to pop off. Very displeased with product quality. Definitely would not recommend, unless you want to hold the battery and cover on with tape.
customer_reviews.author: 4N6-PRO

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten them sooner
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we needed. We use this key finder way too often to not have had it in the past. We are able to find our keys much faster and they are always in a different place. I am probably placing another order soon so I can tack these on to our remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great when they work but I'm changing the batteries way ...
customer_reviews.text: Great when they work but I'm changing the batteries way too frequently. Seems like every time I use the device it doesn't work because they need other batteries. I'm changing my product review to 4 Stars based on the company responding to the last review and sending me another unit which I have had and is working fine. They obviously care about customer satisfaction I'm not giving it 5 stars because sometimes it's hard to hear the beeping of the locator if keys are left in clothing pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Little Soul

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible buy, and I should have listened to the reviews! All but one of the locators during the first week ended up beeping at sporadic times as if the battery was dying. Not ideal when you are in public. I spent countless times trying to get the battery back off to remove the battery so my keys weren't making a scene. What's the point to carrying the locators around if you can't keep the batteries in them?! Also, in trying to hurridly get the batteries out, the inside of the locators are delicate and a couple of the parts broke off rendering them useless. Save your money because these certainly won't locate your keys!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Less Worry
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are a little large to fit on my phone but just right for my keys. The alarm sounds clearly here in my house as well as outside in the yard. Am hoping my Key Finder will prevent having to worry about purchasing another phone. Especially since I found the old one two days after ordering the new one. Am happy with the purchase and would order again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Retired and happy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Does sound alarm when locating
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Does sound alarm when locating. But the big problem which made it un-useable is that the alarm would go off at random times by itself. Not good when your sitting in church or any other place in public. Called about this problem that we were having with the unit and was told that it must be picking up a signal from somewhere and it was working normally. My wife had one unit attached to her purse and another to her blood testing kit. Randomly one or the other would sound a alarm at different locations. Car, store, house or church. Had to remove battery to get it to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. I originally bought these for my husband since he is always losing his wallet and phone, but it seems I'm getting more use out of it than he is. We keep the remote finder on the kitchen counter and I don't have to go hunting for my phone--the remote finder does all the work. So far--very satisfied. My only dislike, hence the 4 stars, it that the finder is slightly larger than I would like. If it were a touch smaller it would be great. Beeps loud enough for me to find it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Concept was good but every time the keyfob is bumped it alerts and you don't even have to press the button. It just keeps beeping
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE

customer_reviews.title: It does not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: The battery case is very hard to get off and then is so easy to go on it just falls off at times. Mine started beeping everywhere at all times of day. I could not get them to stop as I could not get the back off. I was in choir rehearsal and it went off and I could not get it to stop and they could not go on with the rehearsal so I stomped it. The battery did not come out so it kept beeping. Had to leave choir. There are better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It works good but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: This work great to find lost keys. The noise identifier is loud enough. The plastic that keeps the battery has a tendency to pop-out. After about two months of use, everything works fines, however, I lost one of the plastic that holds the battery in. I attached one of these to a senior person's purse. She is very happy that she can always locate her purse.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia T.

customer_reviews.title: I liked these are first
customer_reviews.text: I liked these are first & they did work but when the batteries start getting low they annoyingly beep constantly. And the batteries got low pretty quickly as I recall. The battery covers also didn't seem to stay in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: The product is not working. It worked for only ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is not working. It worked for only one month. First start with a a noise in the part attach to the keys and then stop working..
customer_reviews.author: vilma pellot

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for an elderly woman to keep track of her canes. The battery covers don't tighten securely enough. Sometimes the batteries fell out on their own and they certainly did when she dropped the canes. In the latter case the batteries would shoot across the room, commencing a 10-minute search for them. The biggest problem was that units would go off on their own, possibly because the batteries come loose so easily. No one wants to be woken up in the middle of the night for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Duck Pelago

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew about it before.. Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Easy to use. For those who tend to misplace items it is a must have. Order comes with 4 receivers and 1 remote control. Batteries for receivers are included. Also, 4 rings and 4 adhesive stickers are included so you can attach the receiver to the item you need. Alarm sound is pretty loud. Very convenient thing! I wish I knew about it before.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product - and EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: Washed one of the key fobs in the washing machine by mistake. It still worked! Edit - the remote no longer works. I replaced the batteries and it still won't work on any of the fobs. I haven't had it that long. UPDATE: back to 5 stars! Jeff and Winnie have contacted me from customer service and are sending a new remote! It's not just the product that makes a company great, it's the excellent customer service! I am definitely pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: These work great but...
customer_reviews.text: My kids always lose their keys , so I got these as stocking stuffers . When my husband went to put batteries in then the backs snapped off and broke really easily . We decided to just tape the back on and keep them. But my kids aren’t using them anymore because the tape kept coming off. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: LBurleson

customer_reviews.title: It was an awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this and with our toddler always grabbing our keys and putting them down everywhere except where they belong. It was an awesome purchase... we joke about how it came in handy the first day it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Marli

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my mom turning 80
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mother who is on the long path of dementia. She has long had trouble recalling where she put things and I realized the perfect birthday gift would be a way for her to find her keys and her phone and her purse. She's been able to more quickly find things since I got her these wonderful locators. Thanks for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Annoying random beeps
customer_reviews.text: This thing was not worth the money. Initially it did what it was suppose. Later it started beeping on it's own. Before I discovered it did this, I was searching all over the house for this beeping sound before I realized it was comming from my pockets. There really isnt a button to turn it off like a car alarm. It beeps on its own, it got so annoying that I left the component in the car just so I wouldn't have to hear the constant random beeping. I thought maybe it was a low battery so we changed it, but it was not the battery. I'm going to return this since I wont be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah B.

customer_reviews.title: Great little system for items misplaced at home
customer_reviews.text: I have two mp3 players, a kindle ereader, and a kindle fire that I was constantly misplacing. This keyfinder has solved that problem for a very reasonable price. It's also very sturdy - one of the tags (and the mp3 player to which it was attached) went through the washer and dryer last week. After being allowed to dry out for a few days, I was pleasantly surprised to discover that it's working just fine. (Obviously, I don't recommend that you try this for yourself!) If you lose things around the house, this is a great little system that eliminates one of life's annoyances for a small amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The product works great and is easy to use. The problem is the battery cover easily falls off and the battery comes out. I gave this to my mother on Mother's Day and so far she has lost to battery covers and 1 battery. We have now taped the cover on to the Finder. I was contacted by customer service and had a very positive experience. They replaced the 2 receivers quickly. The product works great and has proven to be an assistance to my Mom when the keys are misplaced.
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: This did not work well.
customer_reviews.text: This model was troublesome. It sound without pressing the button. I am unsure what was wrong and it would not stop beeping. I had to take baterries out. Amazon return passed. Other model works great. Could it have been defective ?
customer_reviews.author: Richard CSUF MSA, Wisconsin MBA

customer_reviews.title: We're so glad to have purchased the JTD Wireless RF Locator/Key Finder
customer_reviews.text: We're so glad to have purchased the JTD Wireless RF Locator/Key Finder. Within the last two months, three of us have lost keys and, with the help of the locator, have found them quickly. The locator has saved us from being late to work and appointments. I will state that we've only used this slightly curved item for keychains as it does not fit into a slim wallet. I'd be ecstatic if it fit into thin wallets as one member of the household loses his wallet at the most inconvenient times (at home, thank God)!
customer_reviews.author: Sbot

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful product. We have a family member who tends to misplace keys, and this is an easy way to locate them. We like that the product includes four color-coded key fobs, and they're small enough not to add a lot of bulk to my--er, that family member's--key ring. How much easier can it get?
customer_reviews.author: Baker Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: These work as told, but the backs don’t fit really tight. This can be good since you have a battery to change. I’d suggest you order replacement batteries because the ones that come with it don’t last very long. Plenty loud when lost in couch or car. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Shelta Ivins

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are life savers! We have a mechanic who always loses keys...not a good thing when u need to fix a car! We would spend hours searching. I saw these a long time ago but finally got them recently because he lost a key that cost $400 to replace! We just include one of these with watch car that is tagged for him. We’ve had them a week and they’ve saved us at least 3 times already! More then get your moneys worth!
customer_reviews.author: MilaJen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent locators for our keys!  Would like to use them for other objects with adhesives.
customer_reviews.text: After my husband ordered this product, I tried it out just to see how it worked. Now he and I are finding it so useful to find our key fobs! We'd love to be able to attach the finding discs to other items with adhesive. We will do that using our own tape or adhesive strips. Perhaps a flat disc version with optional adhesive backing would be a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY AT A REASONABLE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Best $20 I have spent in a long time. A year ago I paid $50 for a competing item and was dissatisfied. One of the things I like about the JTD wireless key finder is that the volume gets louder if I hold the key down on the remote. If you are in the market for one of these, get the JTD Wireless key finder. Great quality at a reasonable price. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: mexrph

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these! I lose my keys ALOT lol and I also put one on the zipper of my wallet cause I lose that as well lol Was great for a few weeks and then they just constantly beep beep beep beep it drives me crazy!!!!!! I changed the batteries and still same day few hours later beep beep beep beep! I would not get these again though I really do need something like this that won't drive me up the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Huggles

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny spent for the time & frustration looking for your keys!
customer_reviews.text: I have one on the dog's leash, key ring & inserted in wallet. Wish they were a little better made because a simple bang can cause the battery backing to dislodge so I had to tape it shut with bold beautiful duct tape. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Marleau

customer_reviews.title: eh u gotta carry around the remote which is just asking for me to lose it too ...
customer_reviews.text: i thought the receivers that beep would go off till i hit a button on them but they beep like 3 times & stops & u have to keep pressing the button on the remote but it works till i lose the remote from carrying it around i wish i could hit the button on the remote & leave the remote behind in the same place so i dont lose it but i gotta take it with me to keep pressing bc theres no way u could find it after just 3 beeps so we will see how long this lasts lol
customer_reviews.author: jenna smith

customer_reviews.title: A few weeks in to the purchase, one started ...
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks in to the purchase, one started randomly beeping and another one followed a few days after that. I had to take the batteries out because of it. These things are not durable when they are on your car keys all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pili

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my expensive locator devices with this.
customer_reviews.text: This low-cost set-up is the best! Much more reliable than devices that connect through a cell phone. The beep from the little receiver(s) is nice and loud, and the signal goes through walls. I also think it's cool that the transmitter has an LED flashlight built-in to it. This locator won't tell you where your item is if you lost it across town, but within 75 to 100 feet of the transmitter (say, in your house) it's a life-saver.
customer_reviews.author: scott beyer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: These have saved me so many times already! We have one on our key we keep hanging in the hallway for our shed, that my husband tends to leave wherever, and it's been amazing being able to find our keys in a timely manner!! Used it for our house/car keys a couple of times too, lol! So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: RunningRivers

customer_reviews.title: Only good for keeping track of your keys...
customer_reviews.text: Only works for keys anything else like remote controls which is the main reason I got it, well it came off and broke apart.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kanigowski

product_meta.title: JTD Wireless RF Item Locator/Key Finder with LED Flashlight and Base Support. with 4 Receivers Key Finder-Wireless Key RF Locator, Remote Control, Pet, Cell, Wireless RF Remote Item, Wallet Locator
product_meta.description:
Warning: THIS item contains small parts.Please keep it away from young children.

is losing keys a major issue?

jtd provides this latest version key finder to solve your problem. This remote key finder tracker) can help you to find the lost keys, remotes, purses, Glasses, canes, and other easily lost Novelties quickly. With just one press on the color-coded button, The beep sound and flashes will lead you to find the lost stuff. This is a unique remote key finder with LED flashlight and holder support. The on/off switch is located at the right side of the transmitter, which allows you to turn on and off the LED flashlight easily. This becomes extremely handy when you need to find something in the dark. The key finder with base support is also a good decoration for your tea table, TV Bench, Bed, computer desk, bookshelf, etc. The remote control transmitter is removable from the holder and can be carried by you to find lost stuff.

transmitter also has handy built-in LED flashlight

the loud beeping sound & flashlight on the receiver will lead you to your lost item

this key finder system includes

· 1 RF transmitter with 4 brightly colored buttons.

· total 4 stylish, brightly colored receivers
feature_bullets: Includes 4 receivers, one transmitter and key rings with a 75-130 feet range.
The loud beeping sound & flashlight on the the receiver will lead you to your lost item
Low consumption and long standby time with stable frequency technique.Wireless search that easily penetrates though walls, cushions and doors with a push of a button.
Lifetime technical support from the manufacture and 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty from JTD

WARNING: This item contains small parts. Please keep it away from young children. Other Tips: Rotate battery cover to ''ON" position to remove the cover, and rotate to "OFF" position to latch the cover.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars1,652 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
